meanings.definition: The organizational and managerial structures within a technological system.
meanings.sent1: The technostructures of the company ensure smooth operations.
meanings.sent2: The IT department is a crucial part of the technostructures in place.
meanings.sent3: The technostructures had a meeting to discuss the wifi password.
meanings.sent4: The technostructures of the business are the backbone of its success.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the technostructures is key to improving efficiency.

meanings.definition: The physical infrastructure that supports technological operations.
meanings.sent1: The data center is a vital part of the technostructures of the organization.
meanings.sent2: The cables and servers form the technostructures needed for internet connectivity.
meanings.sent3: The technostructures were surprised by the sudden power outage.
meanings.sent4: The technostructures crumbled under the weight of the cyber attack.
meanings.sent5: The technostructures stood strong against the storm, keeping the systems running smoothly.
